summary: A replacement co-pilot joins a B-17 bomber crew in North Africa. He soon finds himself at odds with the remainder of the crew and has to regain their trust and support.
cast: Bug Hall|Donnie Jeffcoat|Sean McGowan|Chris Owen|Edward Finlay|Manu Intiraymi|John Laughlin|Howard Gibson|Joe Williamson|Tony Elias|Tim Hade|Jeremy Ray Valdez|Jamie Martz|Mark Doerr|Matt Biedel|Kate Arney-Cimino|Jerry Buteyn|Braxton Davis|Cody Hackman|Charlie Heydt|Steve Holm|Andy E. Horne|Brian Meredith|Bobby Naderi|Anthony Ocasio|Affan Tareen|Drew Van Acker|Valiant Michael
title: Fortress
